getIndexReaders

public List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> getIndexReaders()
                                                                                     throws IOException
return a list of ZoieIndexReaders. These readers are reference counted and this method should be used in pair with returnIndexReaders(List> readers) returnIndexReaders(List). It is typical that we create a MultiReader from these readers. When creating MultiReader, it should be created with the closeSubReaders parameter set to false in order to do reference counting correctly.
If this indexing system is already shut down, then we return an empty list.

指定者：
接口 IndexReaderFactory<ZoieIndexReader<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>> 中的 getIndexReaders
返回：
List of IndexReader instances
抛出：
IOException
另请参见：
returnIndexReaders(List), IndexReaderFactory.getIndexReaders()

returnIndexReaders

public void returnIndexReaders(List<ZoieIndexReader<R>> readers)
从接口 IndexReaderFactory 复制的描述

指定者：

参数：

consume

public void consume(Collection<DataConsumer.DataEvent<D>> data)
             throws ZoieException
从接口 DataConsumer 复制的描述
Consumption of a collection of data events. Note that this method may have a side effect. That is it may empty the Collection passed in after execution. It is good practice if the data collection along with its contents passed to consume(data) never changed by client code later. We also strengthen the contract on this method that the events in data are sorted according to their version numbers and if consume is invoked on collection1 before on collection2, then all the max version number for events in collection1 must be smaller than the min version number for events in collection2.

指定者：
接口 DataConsumer<D> 中的 consume
参数：
data - A collection of data to be consumed.
抛出：
ZoieException

shutdown

public void shutdown()
指定者：
接口 Zoie<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader,D> 中的 shutdown

getVersion

public String getVersion()
从接口 DataConsumer 复制的描述
This method is not meant to be Thread-Safe, since that could add significant complexity and performance issue. When Thread-Safety is desired, the client should add external synchronization.

指定者：
接口 DataConsumer<D> 中的 getVersion
返回：
the version number of events that it has received but not necessarily processed.
